HDG.LOG.content: [lays what is present before into presence] > all disclosure releases (Entbergen enthebt) what is present from concealment [Lacan, return of repressed] > forgetting as a reservoir to draw from [aletheia, trace]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: [lays what is present before into presence] > all disclosure releases (Entbergen enthebt) what is present from concealment [Lacan, return of repressed] > forgetting as a reservoir to draw from [aletheia, trace]

HDG.BC.content: Being like the fleeting cloud of a shadow, like that which doesn’t effect (bewirken) anything or leave behind a trace (Spur) [khōra]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Being like the fleeting cloud of a shadow, like that which doesn’t effect (bewirken) anything or leave behind a trace (Spur) [khōra]

HDG.BC.content: no trace of intention not to say Being [for you either???], so keeping silent comes from Being itself (word arises from realm of silence)
HDG.BC.linkedContent: no trace of intention not to say Being [for you either???], so keeping silent comes from Being itself (word arises from realm of silence)

HDG.BC.content: [alibis] “have done (fertig)” w/ Being by appealing to this/that being (avoid abode [of Being]) > abode (Aufenhaltes) [of Being] contains an exacting expectation (Zumutung), demand to experience abode of historical man, originates from claim of Being itself, claim comes from still-concealed essence of history > a strange demand, don’t minimize [lose hold] of this strangeness (Befremdlichkeit), we need history itself to make us remember, give us hints for reflection, a reflection that grants us remembrance of 1st inception of Western thought [strangeness as trace] > why is that? only inception itself can tell us [heterotautology?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [alibis] “have done (fertig)” w/ Being by appealing to this/that being (avoid abode [of Being]) > abode (Aufenhaltes) [of Being] contains an exacting expectation (Zumutung), demand to experience abode of historical man, originates from claim of Being itself, claim comes from still-concealed essence of history > a strange demand, don’t minimize [lose hold] of this strangeness (Befremdlichkeit), we need history itself to make us remember, give us hints for reflection, a reflection that grants us remembrance of 1st inception of Western thought [strangeness as trace] > why is that? only inception itself can tell us [heterotautology?]

HDG.TB.content: our task: trace Being to its own from Appropriation (w/out regard to relation of Being to beings) [beyond ontological difference? beyond metaphysics?], think Being w/ out regard to metaphysics > but regard for metaphysics still prevails, thus our task is to cease all overcoming [of metaphysics], leave metaphysics to itself
HDG.TB.linkedContent: our task: trace Being to its own from Appropriation (w/out regard to relation of Being to beings) [beyond ontological difference? beyond metaphysics?], think Being w/ out regard to metaphysics > but regard for metaphysics still prevails, thus our task is to cease all overcoming [of metaphysics], leave metaphysics to itself

HDG.QB.content: essence of human being, “Dasein in human being,” is nothing human [the trace, totally other] > when the idea of human essence grounds everything present (i.e. human authoritative, underlying ground): secures beings in their being, (human essence is the presence that first) permits “representation”
HDG.QB.linkedContent: essence of human being, “Dasein in human being,” is nothing human [the trace, totally other] > when the idea of human essence grounds everything present (i.e. human authoritative, underlying ground): secures beings in their being, (human essence is the presence that first) permits “representation”

HDG.CCP.content: as release from transcendental re-presentation, Gelassenheit is a relinquishing of the willing of a horizon > this relinquishing doesn’t stem from a willing, except the occasion for releasing oneself to Gegnet “requires a trace of willing” > this trace vanishes while releasing oneself & is completely extinguished in Gelassenheit [annihilation of trace or absolute ash?]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: as release from transcendental re-presentation, Gelassenheit is a relinquishing of the willing of a horizon > this relinquishing doesn’t stem from a willing, except the occasion for releasing oneself to Gegnet “requires a trace of willing” > this trace vanishes while releasing oneself & is completely extinguished in Gelassenheit [annihilation of trace or absolute ash?]

HDG.DL.content: Winke brauchen den weitesten Schwingungsbereich [hints, traces, need/use the widest swinging realm], where mortals go back-forth slowly, “hesitate (zögern),” done truly when slowness (Langsame) rests (getragen) on shy reverence (die Scheu)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: Winke brauchen den weitesten Schwingungsbereich [hints, traces, need/use the widest swinging realm], where mortals go back-forth slowly, “hesitate (zögern),” done truly when slowness (Langsame) rests (getragen) on shy reverence (die Scheu)

HDG.DL.content: Die Achtsamkeit auf die Spuren, die das Denken in seinen Quellbereich weisen [give heed to trails (traces) that direct thinking back to region of its source] [for Derrida the traces are the source in such a way that there is no source to think back to] > do you find these traces? > I find them because they’re not of my making (stammen), because they’re rarely discernible, like the wind-borne echo of a distant call (fernen Zurufes) [annihilation of trace]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: Die Achtsamkeit auf die Spuren, die das Denken in seinen Quellbereich weisen [give heed to trails (traces) that direct thinking back to region of its source] [for Derrida the traces are the source in such a way that there is no source to think back to] > do you find these traces? > I find them because they’re not of my making (stammen), because they’re rarely discernible, like the wind-borne echo of a distant call (fernen Zurufes) [annihilation of trace]

HDG.DL.content: thinking look (Anleitung) into Sage only beginning of path that takes us back out (zürucknimmt) of metaphysical representations in das Achten auf die Winke jener Botschaft, deren Botengänger wir eigens werden möchten [in the attention/heeding of hints, traces, whose message we would want to properly bear?]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: thinking look (Anleitung) into Sage only beginning of path that takes us back out (zürucknimmt) of metaphysical representations in das Achten auf die Winke jener Botschaft, deren Botengänger wir eigens werden möchten [in the attention/heeding of hints, traces, whose message we would want to properly bear?]

HDG.DL.content: are we not attempting the impossible (Unmögliche)? Allerdings — solange dem Menschen nicht jener Botengang rein gewährt ist , den die Botschaft braucht, die dem Menschen die Entbergung der Zwiefalt zuspricht [basically he says: so long as we have not been given the pure gift of messaging to course through the usage of message that grants us the unconcealment of the two-fold] > veiled relation (Verhältnis) btwn message & messenger’s course plays (spielt) everywhere [play of the trace]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: are we not attempting the impossible (Unmögliche)? Allerdings — solange dem Menschen nicht jener Botengang rein gewährt ist , den die Botschaft braucht, die dem Menschen die Entbergung der Zwiefalt zuspricht [basically he says: so long as we have not been given the pure gift of messaging to course through the usage of message that grants us the unconcealment of the two-fold] > veiled relation (Verhältnis) btwn message & messenger’s course plays (spielt) everywhere [play of the trace]

HDG.WL.content: in the Erläuterung des Sprachwesens as Saying (Sage), our way to language has reached its goal (Ziel), reached language as such [arrival] [so it seems] > in truth, our reflection has only come w/in sight of Weg zur Sprache it is seeking, is barely on its traces (Spur)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: in the Erläuterung des Sprachwesens as Saying (Sage), our way to language has reached its goal (Ziel), reached language as such [arrival] [so it seems] > in truth, our reflection has only come w/in sight of Weg zur Sprache it is seeking, is barely on its traces (Spur)

HDG.WL.content: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)
